definition: Juneau, capital of Alaska/Juno, Roman goddess of marriage

sentences.english: Juneau, Alaska's capital, is an expensive place to live.
sentences.chinese: 朱諾，阿拉斯加的首府，生活費用昂貴。

sentences.english: Juno’s principal goal is to understand the origin and evolution of Jupiter.
sentences.chinese: 朱諾的首要目標是瞭解木星的起源和進化。

sentences.english: Juno, did you by any chance barf in my urn?
sentences.chinese: 朱諾，你在我的瓷缸嘔吐過嗎？

sentences.english: But the vengeance of Juno was not yet satiated.
sentences.chinese: 但是朱諾報復之心不死。

sentences.english: Juno and Minerva were very angry and threatened him.
sentences.chinese: 朱諾和彌涅耳瓦非常生氣並威脅他。

sentences.english: Dog Sled Camp atop Juneau Glacier in Alaska.
sentences.chinese: 狗雪橇營安置在阿拉斯加的朱諾冰川的頂上。

sentences.english: Juno followed and tormented Latona in many ways.
sentences.chinese: 朱諾緊隨着拉多娜，且使用很多方法來折磨她。

sentences.english: Brenda : Juno, you can't just drop in on them like that.
sentences.chinese: 朱諾，你不能像那樣隨隨便便就登門拜訪的。

sentences.english: Juneau is the capital and Anchorage the largest city.
sentences.chinese: 朱諾爲其州府，安克雷奇是最大城市。
